com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI
Class AlpSocietyCollector

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI.SocietyCollector
        |
        +--com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI.AlpSocietyCollector
public class AlpSocietyCollector
extends SocietyCollector

The AlpSocietyCollector provides the functionality needed to bring an ALP Society into the Liason Admin Tool.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1

getSocietyFromDescriptor

public AgentSocietySet getSocietyFromDescriptor(SocietyDescriptor desc)
Return an Alp Society specified by the descriptor. Note-- this will also, as a side effect, set theApplication.alpSet to the returned set value. We need this in case we launch any listners from this method.
Overrides:
getSocietyFromDescriptor in class SocietyCollector

public java.util.ArrayList getALPAgentsFromJavaSpace(SocietyDescriptor desc)
This method is responsible for returning all ALPAgentReferences that it can find in the JavaSpace with the name desc.societyName;

loadSocietyByName

public AgentSocietySet loadSocietyByName(java.lang.String socName)
This method is no longer supported.

releaseSociety

public void releaseSociety()
This method turns off/disconnect any listeners that will be bringing in updates. It is to be invoked whenever a new society is brought in. We aren't quite ready to user it yet.
Overrides:
releaseSociety in class SocietyCollector

writeOutALPListtoJavaSpace

public void writeOutALPListtoJavaSpace(java.util.ArrayList alpRefList)
This routine writes out a list of agent references to the JavaSpace. It does not have to know if they already exist or not.
